name: Lima
description:
LIMA is a 6 weeks project/prototype realised by a team of 5 person, 2 Artists, 2 Devs and 1 GameDesigner at Technocité in Mons (Belgium) from 13/01/2020 to 21/02/2020. 

Please note that GamePlay is accelerated to be sure that you can unlock pretty much all features in less than 20 minutes. In the real game, experience will be slowed down !

Start your empire now !

Lima is an Idle / Light RTS / Management game. You can choose between 3 factions (only 1 realesed yet) which have each one their strenghts and weaknesses. Your goal is to beat all your opponents, build the biggest nation and generate tons of resources.

- Gather Resources : You'll have to gather 3 types of ressources, they are all useful ! Spend them wisely.

- Click Everywhere : Every building is clickable, find out how to spend your time the most efficiently ! Or find a better way to play in the skill tree ;)

- Endless Gameplay : You have no maximum level, play as much as you want !

- Full Customization : Are you more an agressive player ? An Idle Player ? An Active Player ? A Defense Player ? You can play any way you like in Lima, simply by putting your skill points in your prefered skills !

- Unlock all the possibilities : You'll start with extremely low features, the more you play the more you can do ! 

- Gigantic Armies : Recruit as much soldier as you like. They each have their strenghts and weaknesses, find out by fighting and spying your enemies.
